patthana15.37:1.1: Nosaññojanaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… noganthaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… nooghaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noogho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… noyogaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noyogo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… nonīvaraṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… noparāmāsaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noparāmāso nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
